name: mirzapur
description: A criminal mastermind who goes by 'The Professor' plans the biggest heist in recorded history.

name: The Crown
description: Follows the political rivalries and romance of Queen Elizabeth II's reign and the events that shaped the second half of the 20th century.

name: Stranger Things
description: A group of kids in a small town uncover a series of supernatural mysteries linked to a secret government lab.
